price: Na Yεde n’abusuafoͻ no maa no, san de ne sεso kaa wͻn ho, (woi yε) ahummͻborͻ a efiri Yεn hͻ, na εsan nso yε afutusεm de ma mmadwemmafoᴐ no .
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهۡلَهُۥ وَمِثۡلَهُم مَّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum raḥmatan minnā wadhik'rā li-ulī al-albābi
